001package game;
002import java.io.InputStream;
003import java.util.ArrayList;
004import java.util.List;
005import java.util.Scanner;
006import javax.swing.Timer;
007
008/**
009 *  This class is part of the "World of Zuul" application. 
010 *  "World of Zuul" is a very simple, text based adventure game.
011 * 
012 *  This class creates all rooms, creates the parser and starts
013 *  the game.  It also evaluates and executes the commands that 
014 *  the parser returns.
015 * 
016 * @author  Michael Kolling and David J. Barnes
017 * @version 1.0 (Jan 2003) DB edited (2019) Christophe TARATIBU modified (2025)
018 * @version 2025/2026 (09.01.2026) Christophe TARATIBU
019 */
020public class GameEngine
021{
022    /**Delay between test commands (ms) to let UI refresh images*/
023    private static final int TEST_DELAY_MS = 2000;
024    /** Total game duration in milliseconds */
025    private static final int GAME_DURATION_MS = 600000; // 10 minutes
026    /** Parser used to execute commands */
027    private final Parser aParser;
028    /** User's graphical interface */
029    private UserInterface aGui;
030    /** Attribute used for tests */
031    private boolean aTestMode;
032    /** Player's data */
033    private Player aPlayer;
034    /** Timer used to timegate the party */
035    private Timer aGameTimer;
036    /** Countdown before the end of the game */
037    private Timer aCountdownTimer;
038    /** Time when the game started */
039    private long aGameStartMillis;
040    /** String used to control random behavior in tests */
041    private String aAleaString;
042
043    /**
044     * Constructor for objects of class GameEngine
045     */
046    public GameEngine()
047    {
048        this("Tetsuma");
049    }
050
051    /**
052     * Constructor allowing to pick the player's name.
053     * @param pPlayerName player name
054     */
055    public GameEngine(final String pPlayerName)
056    {
057        this.aParser = new Parser();
058        this.createRooms(pPlayerName);
059        //this.aPreviouRooms = new Stack<>();
060        this.aTestMode = false;
061        this.aAleaString = null;
062    }
063
064    /**
065     *  Returns the player (used in userInterface)
066     *  @return The player
067    */
068    public Player getPlayer(){
069        return this.aPlayer;
070    }
071
072    /**
073     * Sets the GUI
074     * @param pUserInterface User Interface 
075     */
076    public void setGUI( final UserInterface pUserInterface )
077    {
078        this.aGui = pUserInterface;
079        this.printWelcome();
080        this.startGameTimer();
081    }
082
083    /**
084     * Print out the opening message for the player.
085     */
086    private void printWelcome()
087    {
088        this.aGui.print( "\n" );
089        this.aGui.println( "Welcome to game of The return of Yamata no Orochi, " + this.aPlayer.getName() + "!" );
090        this.aGui.println( "The monster came back to life and Tetsuma must create a katana to save Japan !." );
091        this.aGui.println("From now, you have to help him find materials to let him create the weapon !");
092        this.aGui.println( "Type 'help' if you need help." );
093        this.aGui.print( "\n" );
094        this.aGui.println( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getLongDescription() );
095        if ( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() != null )
096            this.aGui.showImage( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() );
097    }
098
099   /**
100     * Create all the rooms and link their exits together.
101     * @param pPlayerName The name of the player
102     */
103    private void createRooms(final String pPlayerName){
104        Room vShirago = new Room("in your village of birth, Shirakawa-go.","./Images/shirakawa.jpg","Shirakawa-go");
105        TransporterRoom vGujoHachi = new TransporterRoom("In the Guj√¥ Hachiman castle.","./Images/gujohachi.jpg","Gujo Hachiman");
106        Room vOsaka = new Room("in the Osaka city.","./Images/Osaka.jpg","Osaka");
107        Room vTsushi = new Room("in the Tsushima island.","./Images/Tsushima.jpg","Tsushima");
108        Room vSeki = new Room("in the Seki blacksmiths village, it's the end of your odyssey.","./Images/seki.jpg","Seki");
109        Room vNara = new Room("in the Nara city known for its deers.","./Images/Nara_fire.jpg","Nara");
110        Room vGinkaku = new Room("in the Ginkaku-ji temple.","./Images/Ginkakuji_fall_2.jpg","Ginkaku-ji");
111        Room vKinkaku = new Room("in the Kinkaku-ji temple.","./Images/Kinkaku.jpg","Kinkaku-ji");
112        Room vYoshino = new Room("in the Yoshino national park, the forest is big here.","./Images/Yoshino_park.jpg","Yoshino");
113        Room vNagoya  = new Room("in the Nagoya city","./Images/Nagoya.jpg","Nagoya");
114        Room vMtFuji = new Room("at the foot of the Mt Fuji.","./Images/MtFuji.jpg","Mt Fuji");
115        Room vTokyo = new Room("in the Tokyo tower, the biggest tower of Japan.","./Images/tokyo_tower.jpg","Tokyo");
116        Room vSapporo = new Room("in the Sapporo city, in the north of Japan.","./Images/sapporo_snow.jpg","Sapporo");
117        Room vAogashi = new Room("in the island of Aogashima, in the middle of the ocean.","./Images/Aogashima.jpg","Aogashima");
118        
119        
120        
121        vShirago.setExit("south", vGujoHachi);
122        vShirago.addItem("Mochi", new Item("A sweety mochi", 1));
123
124        // GujoHachi : up -> MtFuji, west -> Osaka
125        vGujoHachi.setExit("up", vMtFuji);
126        vGujoHachi.setExit("west", vOsaka);
127
128        // Osaka : north -> Ginkaku, east -> GujoHachi, south -> Nara, west -> Tsushi
129        vOsaka.setExit("north", vGinkaku);
130        vOsaka.setExit("east", vGujoHachi);
131        vOsaka.setExit("south", vNara);
132        vOsaka.setExit("west", vTsushi);
133        vOsaka.addItem("Anko mochi", new Item("A mochi with anko flavour of Osaka", 2));
134
135        // Ginkaku : east -> Kinkaku, south -> Osaka
136        vGinkaku.setExit("east", vKinkaku);
137        vGinkaku.setExit("south", vOsaka);
138        vGinkaku.addItem("Silver Shigane", new Item("A silver metal used for blade crafting", 3));
139
140        // Kinkaku : south -> Ginkaku
141        vKinkaku.setExit("south", vGinkaku);
142        vKinkaku.addItem("Gold Tamagane", new Item("A golden metal used for blade crafting", 3));
143
144        // Tsushi : north -> Osaka, east -> Seki
145        vTsushi.setExit("north", vOsaka);
146        vTsushi.setExit("east", vSeki);
147        vTsushi.addItem("Ryujin's scale", new Item("A scale impregnated by the sea god's energy", 2));
148
149        // Seki : west -> Tsushi
150        vSeki.setExit("west", vTsushi);
151
152        // Nara : east -> Yoshino
153        vNara.setExit("east", vYoshino);
154        vNara.setTrapDoorExit("south", vOsaka);
155        vNara.addItem("Horn of the deer goddess", new Item("A horn given by the goddess of deers", 2));
156
157        // Yoshino : east -> Nagoya
158        vYoshino.setExit("east", vNagoya);
159        vYoshino.addItem("Bamboo of the holy forest", new Item("A rare type of bamboo which only exists here, used for blade creation", 2));
160
161        // Nagoya : up -> MtFuji, west -> Yoshino
162        vNagoya.setExit("west", vYoshino);
163        vNagoya.setExit("up", vMtFuji);
164        vNagoya.setTrapDoorExit("south", vTokyo);
165        vNagoya.addItem("Habaki",new Item("A copper necklace used for the blade crafting", 4));
166        
167
168        // MtFuji : north -> Sapporo, east -> Tokyo, south -> Nagoya, west -> GujoHachi
169        vMtFuji.setExit("down", vSapporo);
170        vMtFuji.setExit("east", vTokyo);
171        vMtFuji.setExit("south", vNagoya);
172        vMtFuji.setExit("west", vGujoHachi);
173        vNagoya.addItem("Space-time kunai", new Item("A weapon which can send the user to another place",7));
174
175        // Tokyo : west -> Nagoya
176        vTokyo.setExit("west", vNagoya);
177        vTokyo.addItem("Amaterasu's amulet",new Item("An amulet which burns monsters and yokais", 3));
178
179        // Sapporo : south -> Aogashi
180        vSapporo.setExit("south", vAogashi);
181        vSapporo.addItem("Ice dragon's amulet",new Item("An amulet which freezes monsters and yokais", 4));
182
183
184        // Aogashi : north -> Sapporo, south -> Tokyo
185        vAogashi.setExit("north", vSapporo);
186        vAogashi.setExit("south", vTokyo);
187        vAogashi.addItem("Aogashima's salt", new Item("Holy salt used for purifying monsters", 1));
188        this.aPlayer = new Player(pPlayerName);
189        this.aPlayer.setCurrentRoom(vShirago);
190
191
192        // Set transporter room destinations
193        vGujoHachi.setDestinations(new ArrayList<Room>(List.of(vTsushi, vSapporo, vAogashi, vGinkaku)));
194
195    }
196
197    /**
198     * Eat an item
199     * @param pCmd The command to process
200     */
201    private void eat(final Command pCmd){
202        if(!pCmd.hasSecondWord()){
203            this.aGui.println("Eat what ?");
204            return;
205        }
206        String vItemName = pCmd.getSecondWord();
207        Item vItem = this.aPlayer.getItem(vItemName);
208        if(vItem == null){
209            this.aGui.println("You don't have this item !");
210        } 
211        if (!vItemName.equals("Anko mochi") && !vItemName.equals("Mochi") ){
212            this.aGui.println("You can't eat this item !");
213            return;
214
215        } else if(vItemName.equals("Anko mochi")){
216            this.aPlayer.superPower();
217            this.aPlayer.removeItem(vItemName);
218            this.aPlayer.setWeight(this.aPlayer.getWeight() - vItem.getItemWeight());
219            this.aGui.println("You have eaten the Anko Mochi ! Your maximum weight has been doubled !");
220        }else if(vItemName.equals("Mochi")){
221            this.aPlayer.removeItem(vItemName);
222            this.aPlayer.setWeight(this.aPlayer.getWeight() - vItem.getItemWeight());
223            this.aGui.println("You have eaten the mochi, it was really delicious !!!");
224        }
225        
226        return;
227    }
228
229    /**
230     * Print out the description of the current room.
231     */
232    private void look(){
233        this.aGui.println( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getLongDescription() );
234        if ( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() != null )
235            this.aGui.showImage( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() );
236    }
237
238    /**
239     * Go back to the previous room
240     */
241    private void back(){
242        //bleb
243        Room vPreviousRoom = this.aPlayer.getPreviousRoom();
244        //System.out.println("Previous room : " + vPreviousRoom.getRoomName());
245        if(vPreviousRoom == null || this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().isExit(vPreviousRoom)){
246            this.aGui.println("You can't go back any further !");
247            this.aPlayer.emptyPreviousRooms();
248            return;
249        }
250        else{
251            this.aPlayer.setCurrentRoom(vPreviousRoom);
252            this.aGui.println( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getLongDescription() );
253            if ( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() != null )
254                this.aGui.showImage( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() );
255        }
256    }
257
258    /**
259     * Start (or restart) the global game timer. When it fires, the player loses.
260     */
261    private void startGameTimer(){
262        if (this.aGameTimer != null){
263            this.aGameTimer.stop();
264        }
265        if (this.aCountdownTimer != null){
266            this.aCountdownTimer.stop();
267        }
268        this.aGameStartMillis = System.currentTimeMillis();
269
270        // countdown display each second
271        this.aCountdownTimer = new Timer(1000, e -> {
272            long vRemaining = this.remainingTime();
273            if (vRemaining <= 0){
274                this.aCountdownTimer.stop();
275                // Let the main timer handle loss, just show 00:00 now
276                this.aGui.updateTimerLabel("00:00");
277            } else {
278                this.aGui.updateTimerLabel(this.formatTime(vRemaining));
279            }
280        });
281        this.aCountdownTimer.setRepeats(true);
282        this.aCountdownTimer.start();
283
284        this.aGameTimer = new Timer(GAME_DURATION_MS, e -> {
285            this.aGui.println("Time is up! You lose.");
286            this.endGame();
287        });
288        this.aGameTimer.setRepeats(false);
289        this.aGameTimer.start();
290
291        // initialise display immediately
292        this.aGui.updateTimerLabel(this.formatTime(GAME_DURATION_MS));
293    }
294
295    /**
296     * Calculate remaining milliseconds before time is up.
297     * @return Remaining milliseconds
298     */
299    private long remainingTime(){
300        long vElapsed = System.currentTimeMillis() - this.aGameStartMillis;
301        return Math.max(0, GAME_DURATION_MS - vElapsed);
302    }
303
304    /**
305     * Format milliseconds as mm:ss string.
306     * @param pMillis Milliseconds to format
307     * @return Formatted string
308     */
309    private String formatTime(final long pMillis){
310        long vTotalSeconds = pMillis / 1000;
311        long vMinutes = vTotalSeconds / 60;
312        long vSeconds = vTotalSeconds % 60;
313        return String.format("%02d:%02d", vMinutes, vSeconds);
314    }
315
316    /**
317     * Take an item from the room
318     * @param pCmd The command to process
319     */
320    public void take(final Command pCmd){
321        if(!pCmd.hasSecondWord()){
322            this.aGui.println("Take what ?");
323            return;
324        }
325        String vItemName = pCmd.getSecondWord();
326        Item vItem = this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getItem(vItemName);
327        if(vItem == null){
328            this.aGui.println("This item is not here !");
329        } else{
330            int vNewWeight = this.aPlayer.getWeight() + vItem.getItemWeight();
331            if(vNewWeight > this.aPlayer.getMaxWeight()){
332                this.aGui.println("You can't take this item, it's too heavy !");
333            } else{
334                this.aPlayer.addItem(vItemName, vItem);
335                this.aPlayer.setWeight(vNewWeight);
336                this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().removeItem(vItemName);
337                this.aGui.println("You have taken the " + vItemName);
338                this.aGui.println(vItem.getItemDescription());
339            }
340        }
341    }
342
343    /**
344     * Drop an item in the room
345     * @param pCmd The command to process
346     */
347    public void drop(final Command pCmd){
348        if(!pCmd.hasSecondWord()){
349            this.aGui.println("Drop what ?");
350            return;
351        }
352        String vItemName = pCmd.getSecondWord();
353        Item vItem = this.aPlayer.getItem(vItemName);
354        if(vItem == null){
355            this.aGui.println("You don't have this item !");
356        } else{
357            this.aPlayer.removeItem(vItemName);
358            int vNewWeight = this.aPlayer.getWeight() - vItem.getItemWeight();
359            this.aPlayer.setWeight(vNewWeight);
360            this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().addItem(vItemName, vItem);
361            this.aGui.println("You have dropped the " + vItemName);
362        }
363    }
364    /**
365     * Show player's inventory
366     */
367    private void playerInventory(){
368        this.aGui.println("You have : \n" + this.aPlayer.getItems());
369        this.aGui.println("Current weight : " + this.aPlayer.getWeight() + " / " + this.aPlayer.getMaxWeight());
370       
371    }
372
373    /**
374     * Plant the kunai in the current room
375     * @param pCmd The command to process
376     */
377    private void plant(final Command pCmd){
378        if(!pCmd.hasSecondWord()){
379            this.aGui.println("Plant what ?");
380            return;
381        }
382        String vText = pCmd.getSecondWord();
383        Item vItem = this.aPlayer.getItem(vText);
384        if(vItem == null){
385            this.aGui.println("You don't have this item !, you can't write your current place.");
386            return;
387
388        } else if(vText.equals("Space-time kunai")){
389            this.aPlayer.setPlantedRoom(this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom());
390            this.aGui.println("You have used the Space-time kunai to write your current place :" + this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getRoomName());
391            return;
392
393        } else {
394            this.aGui.println("You can't write with this item !");
395            return;
396        }
397        
398    }
399
400    /**
401     * Use the power of planted kunai to go to the room
402     * @param pCmd The command to process
403     */
404    private void use(final Command pCmd){
405        if(!pCmd.hasSecondWord()){
406            this.aGui.println("Use what ?");
407            return;
408        }
409        String vText = pCmd.getSecondWord();
410        Item vItem = this.aPlayer.getItem(vText);
411        if(vItem == null){
412            this.aGui.println("You don't have this item !");
413            return;
414
415        } else if(vText.equals("Space-time kunai")){
416            Room vPlantedRoom = this.aPlayer.getPlantedRoom();
417            if(vPlantedRoom == null){
418                this.aGui.println("You haven't planted any place yet !");
419                return;
420                
421            } else {
422               //this.aPlayer.addPreviousRoom(this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom());
423                this.aPlayer.setCurrentRoom(vPlantedRoom);
424                this.aGui.println( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getLongDescription() );
425                if ( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() != null )
426                    this.aGui.showImage( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() );
427                Command vForceCmd = new Command("drop", "Space-time kunai"); 
428                this.drop(vForceCmd);
429                this.aGui.println("You have used the Space-time kunai to go back to the planted place.");
430                this.aGui.println("Once used, the kunai vanishes !");
431                this.aPlayer.emptyPreviousRooms();
432                this.aPlayer.resetPlantedRoom();
433                return;
434            }
435
436        } else {
437            this.aGui.println("You can't use this item !");
438            return;
439        }
440        
441    }
442
443    /**
444     * Manage the alea command to control random behavior in tests.
445     * - alea string: memorizes the string to determine the next random draw
446     * - alea: clears the string to allow truly random draws
447     * This command should only be used in test mode.
448     * @param pCmd The command to process
449     */
450    private void alea(final Command pCmd){
451        // Uncomment the next 4 lines to restrict alea to test mode only
452        // if (!this.aTestMode) {
453        //     this.aGui.println("The 'alea' command can only be used in test mode.");
454        //     return;
455        // }
456        
457        if(!pCmd.hasSecondWord()){
458            // No parameter: clear the alea string
459            this.aAleaString = null;
460            this.aGui.println("Random mode restored (alea cleared).");
461        } else {
462            // Parameter provided: memorize it
463            this.aAleaString = pCmd.getSecondWord();
464            this.aGui.println("Alea set to: " + this.aAleaString);
465        }
466    }
467
468
469    /**
470     * Process the command. Return true if the command ends the game, false otherwise.
471     * @param pCmdLine The command to process.
472     */
473    public void interpretCommand(final String pCmdLine) {
474        this.aGui.println( "> " + pCmdLine);
475        Command pCmd = this.aParser.getCommand( pCmdLine );
476        if (pCmd.isUnknown()) {
477            this.aGui.println("I don't know what you mean...");
478            return;
479        }
480        String vCommandWord = pCmd.getCommandWord();
481        if ("help".equals(vCommandWord)) {
482            this.printHelp();
483
484        } else if ("go".equals(vCommandWord)) {
485            this.goRooms(pCmd);
486
487        } else if ("quit".equals(vCommandWord)) {
488            if (pCmd.hasSecondWord()) {
489                this.aGui.println("Quit what ?");
490            } else {
491                this.endGame();
492            }
493
494        } else if("look".equals(vCommandWord)){
495            this.look();
496
497        } else if ("eat".equals(vCommandWord)){
498            this.eat(pCmd);
499
500        } else if ("back".equals(vCommandWord)){
501            this.back();
502
503        } else if("test".equals(vCommandWord)){
504            this.testFile(pCmd);
505
506        } else if("take".equals(vCommandWord)){
507            this.take(pCmd);
508
509        } else if("drop".equals(vCommandWord)){
510            this.drop(pCmd);
511
512        } else if("items".equals(vCommandWord)){
513            this.playerInventory();
514
515        } else if("plant".equals(vCommandWord)){
516            this.plant(pCmd);
517
518        } else if("use".equals(vCommandWord)){
519            this.use(pCmd);
520
521        } else if("alea".equals(vCommandWord)){
522            this.alea(pCmd);
523
524        } else {
525            System.out.println("Unknown command word: " + vCommandWord);
526            return;
527        }
528    }
529
530    
531    /**
532     * Launch a test file
533     * @param pCommand The command to process
534     */
535    private void testFile (final Command pCommand){
536        if (this.aTestMode) {
537            this.aGui.println("A test is already running, please wait.");
538            return;
539        }
540        if(pCommand.hasSecondWord() == false){
541            this.aGui.println("Error : you must specify a file name !");
542            return;
543        }
544      
545        String vFileName = pCommand.getSecondWord();
546        System.out.println("Test file : " + vFileName);
547        vFileName+=".txt";
548        System.out.println("Full file name : " + vFileName);
549        InputStream vInputStream = this.getClass().getClassLoader().getResourceAsStream(vFileName);
550        if (vInputStream == null){
551            this.aGui.println("Error : file not found !");
552            return;
553        }
554
555        List<String> vCommands = new ArrayList<>();
556        try (Scanner vScanner = new Scanner(vInputStream)){
557            while (vScanner.hasNextLine()){
558                String vLine = vScanner.nextLine().trim();
559                // Ignore empty lines and comments (starting with // or #)
560                if (!vLine.isEmpty() && !vLine.startsWith("//") && !vLine.startsWith("#")){
561                    vCommands.add(vLine);
562                }
563            }
564        }
565
566        if (vCommands.isEmpty()){
567            this.aGui.println("The test file is empty or only contains comments.");
568            return;
569        }
570
571        this.aTestMode = true;
572        final int[] vIndex = {0};
573        final Timer vTimer = new Timer(TEST_DELAY_MS, null);
574        vTimer.addActionListener(ev -> {
575            if (vIndex[0] < vCommands.size()){
576                String vNext = vCommands.get(vIndex[0]++);
577                this.interpretCommand(vNext);
578            } else {
579                vTimer.stop();
580                this.aTestMode = false;
581                this.aGui.println("Test finished.");
582            }
583        });
584        vTimer.setRepeats(true);
585        vTimer.start();
586    }
587
588   
589
590    // implementations of user commands:
591
592   /**
593     * Print out some help information.
594     * Here we print some stupid, cryptic message and a list of the command words.
595     */
596    public void printHelp(){
597        this.aGui.println("You are lost. You are alone.\r\n" + //
598                        "You wander around Japan.\r\n" + //
599                        "\r\n" + //
600                        "Your command words are:\r\n" +  this.aParser.showCommands() //
601                        );
602       
603    }
604
605    /**
606     * Check if the player has won and forges the blade if so.
607     * @param pRoom The current room of the player
608     */
609    public void winAndForge(final Room pRoom){
610        String aRoomName = pRoom.getRoomName();
611        if(aRoomName.equals("Seki")){
612            this.aGui.println("You've arrived at your destination.");
613            this.aGui.println("The blacksmith chief needs all of the objects you've found");
614            List<String> vPlayerItems = this.aPlayer.getInventoryItemNames();
615            List<String> vItemsBlade = new ArrayList<String>(List.of("Silver Shigane","Gold Tamagane",
616            "Ryujin's scale","Horn of the deer goddess","Bamboo of the holy forest","Habaki","Aogashima's salt"
617            ));
618            if(vPlayerItems.containsAll(vItemsBlade) ){
619                this.aGui.println("You got all of the items, the blade was created and given to Susanoo !");
620                this.aGui.println("You've won !");
621                this.endGame();
622            } else {
623                this.aGui.println("Some items are missing, you need to find them quickly !");
624                this.aGui.println("The monster is coming! Hurry up !");
625            }
626        }else {
627            return;
628        }
629    }
630
631    /**
632     * Go to the room in the given direction. If there is no room in that
633     * direction, print an error message.
634     * @param pCmd the command to process (should contain "go" and a direction).
635     */
636    private void goRooms(Command pCmd){
637        if(!pCmd.hasSecondWord()){
638            System.out.println("Go where ?");
639            return;
640        }
641
642        String vDirection = pCmd.getSecondWord();
643        Room vNextRoom = this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getExit(vDirection);
644        if(vNextRoom == null){
645            this.aGui.println("There's no door");
646
647        } else {
648            this.aPlayer.addPreviousRoom(this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom());
649            // If the next room is a transporter room, choose a random room among its possible rooms
650            if (vNextRoom instanceof TransporterRoom){
651                TransporterRoom vTransporterRoom = (TransporterRoom) vNextRoom;
652                this.aPlayer.setCurrentRoom(vTransporterRoom);
653                this.aGui.println(this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getLongDescription());
654                if (this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() != null){
655                    this.aGui.showImage(this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName());
656                }
657                Timer vRandomTimer = new Timer(4000, e -> {
658                    int vRngNumber;
659                    if (this.aAleaString != null) {
660                        // Use the alea string to determine the room
661                        vRngNumber = vTransporterRoom.getIndexForRoomName(this.aAleaString);
662                        if (vRngNumber == -1) {
663                            // Room name not found, use random
664                            this.aGui.println("Warning: Room '" + this.aAleaString + "' not found in destinations. Using random.");
665                            vRngNumber = vTransporterRoom.getRngNumber();
666                        }
667                        // Consume the alea string after use
668                        this.aAleaString = null;
669                    } else {
670                        // No alea string, use truly random
671                        vRngNumber = vTransporterRoom.getRngNumber();
672                    }
673                    vTransporterRoom.setChosenRoom(vRngNumber);
674                    Room vChosenRoom = vTransporterRoom.getChosenRoom();
675                    this.aPlayer.setCurrentRoom(vChosenRoom);
676                    this.aGui.println("The transporter room teleports you to another place !");
677                    this.aGui.println(this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getLongDescription());
678                    if (this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() != null){
679                        this.aGui.showImage(this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName());
680                    }
681                    vTransporterRoom.resetChosenRoom();
682                });
683                this.aPlayer.emptyPreviousRooms();
684                vRandomTimer.setRepeats(false);
685                vRandomTimer.start();
686                return;
687            }
688            this.aPlayer.setCurrentRoom(vNextRoom);
689            this.aGui.println( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getLongDescription() );
690            if ( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() != null )
691                this.aGui.showImage( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() ); 
692            this.winAndForge(vNextRoom);
693
694        }
695    }
696
697    
698
699
700    /**
701     * End the game
702     */
703    public void endGame(){
704        this.aGui.println( "Thank you for playing.  Good bye." );
705        this.aGui.enable( false );
706        if (this.aGameTimer != null){
707            this.aGameTimer.stop();
708        }
709        if (this.aCountdownTimer != null){
710            this.aCountdownTimer.stop();
711        }
712    }
713
714    /**
715     * Get item names present in the current room (for UI selection)
716     * @return array of item names; empty array if none
717     */
718    public List<String> getCurrentRoomItemNames(){
719        return this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getItemNames();
720    }
721
722    /**
723     * Get item names present in player's inventory (for UI selection)
724     * @return array of item names; empty array if none
725     */
726    public List<String> getPlayerItemNames(){
727        return this.aPlayer.getInventoryItemNames();
728    }
729
730}
